scraping.title: Data
scraping.description: Fetch the latest ability draft statistics from Windrun.io.

liquipedia.title: Liquipedia Enrichment
liquipedia.description: Fetch ability ordering data (Q/W/E/R) from Liquipedia. Rate-limited to 1 request per 31 seconds.
liquipedia.warning: This takes ~67 minutes for all heroes due to Liquipedia rate limits.

mapper.title: Resolution Mapper
mapper.description: Map screen coordinates for custom resolutions.

capture.title: Capture Screenshot
capture.description: Take a screenshot of Dota 2's Ability Draft screen to use as a reference.

autoDetect.title: Auto-Detection
autoDetect.autoScaleWarningDetail: This resolution doesn't have a built-in preset. Coordinates are mathematically scaled and may be slightly off (~5px). For best accuracy, consider using a common resolution (1920x1080, 2560x1440, etc.).
autoDetect.done: Layout is ready. No calibration needed.
autoDetect.noLayoutHelp: No layout available for this resolution. Submit your screenshot and we'll add support.

report.success: Screenshot submitted successfully! We'll add support for this resolution.

anchor.title: 4-Anchor Calibration
anchor.description: Click 4 reference points to calibrate your resolution.
anchor.instruction1: Top-left corner of first ultimate slot
anchor.instruction2: Bottom-right corner of first ultimate slot

verify.title: Verify Layout
verify.description: Review the mapped coordinates overlaid on your screenshot.

save.title: Save Layout
save.description: Save this calibrated layout for future use.

common.zoomTip: Scroll to zoom, Ctrl+drag to pan
